title: seqeralabs/nf-dragen pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

seq_type.errorMessage: Type of sequencing data must be provided and must be either 'DNA' or 'RNA'
